nodes.text: And-Yees was a male Gran wanted by the Republic Security Force for being a rogue assassin. He was credited as being extremely dangerous, with credentials as a sharpshooter. Prior to his capture by the bounty hunter Jango Fett for 1,500 credits, he had last been seen on Gromas. And-Yees' relation to the similarly named Ree-Yees is unknown.
He was named after the lead tester of the game. And-Yees is the third bounty located at the second level he is worth 1,500 credits alive and 750 credits dead.
